title: The plural informal imperative (5-Minute German Grammar)

media:group.media:title: The plural informal imperative (5-Minute German Grammar)
media:group.media:description:
Need these slides for your class? Download them here: http://bit.ly/2dmUfeg
About the series producer: https://doktorfrag.wordpress.com

5-Minute German Grammar covers fundamental aspects of German grammar in a shorter period of time, which helps to keep the instructional focus sharp and the material easy to learn. This high definition video with closed captioning will introduce the plural informal imperative. Video highlights include:

00:07 Review of the singular informal imperative
00:52 Forming the plural informal imperative
01:39 Irregular informal imperative form of “sein”
